Parameters.Name: subscription
Parameters.Description: IMPORTANT: please provide a subscription id to enable dropdown functionality for various arm id parameters, such as resourcegroup_arm_id, network_arm_id, etc.

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Override the name of the resource group that will be provisioned

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Provide an existing resource group for the deployment

Parameters.Name: custom_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the prefix that will be added to the resource names

Parameters.Name: use_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines if a prefix will be added to the resource names

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default admin network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default database network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default application network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default web network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: database_dual_nics
Parameters.Description: Defines if the database tier will have two NICs

Parameters.Name: database_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the database instance number

Parameters.Name: db_disk_sizes_filename
Parameters.Description: Defines the custom disk size file. See custom disk sizing

Parameters.Name: database_vm_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Controls if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used

Parameters.Name: database_vm_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the default authentication for the Database Virtual Machines

Parameters.Name: database_vm_avset_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: Defines a list of availability sets in which to place the database virtual machines

Parameters.Name: database_no_ppg
Parameters.Description: Defines that the database virtual machines will not be placed in a proximity placement group

Parameters.Name: database_no_avset
Parameters.Description: Defines that the database virtual machines will not be placed in an availability set

Parameters.Name: database_tags
Parameters.Description: Defines a list of tags to be applied to the database server

Parameters.Name: database_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified load balancer IP

Parameters.Name: database_vm_db_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified IPs

Parameters.Name: database_vm_db_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified IPs as secondary IPs

Parameters.Name: database_vm_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified IPs (admin subnet)

Parameters.Name: database_vm_storage_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified IPs (storage subnet)

Parameters.Name: hana_dual_nics
Parameters.Description: If defined, will use dual NICs for HANA

Parameters.Name: app_tier_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the default authentication model for the Application tier VMs (key/password)

Parameters.Name: app_tier_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Controlls if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used (true)

Parameters.Name: app_tier_dual_nics
Parameters.Description: Controlls if the application tier servers should have two network cards

Parameters.Name: app_disk_sizes_filename
Parameters.Description: If you want to customise the disk sizes for application tier use the following parameter. See custom disk sizing

Parameters.Name: use_loadbalancers_for_standalone_deployments
Parameters.Description: Used to control if standalone deployments (non HA) will have load balancers

Parameters.Name: application_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Provides the SKU to use for the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the network interface cars connected to the admin subnet

Parameters.Name: application_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: IP addresses for the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: IP addresses for the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_no_avset
Parameters.Description: If true, the application tier will not use an availability set

Parameters.Name: application_server_vm_avset_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: If provided, Azure resource ids for the availability sets to use for the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_no_ppg
Parameters.Description: If provided, the application servers will not be placed in a proximity placement group

Parameters.Name: scs_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Provides the SKU to use for the scs servers

Parameters.Name: scs_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the network interface cars connected to the scs subnet

Parameters.Name: scs_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the network interface cars connected to the admin subnet

Parameters.Name: scs_server_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the load balancer for the network interface cars connected to the application subnet

Parameters.Name: scs_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the scs servers

Parameters.Name: scs_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the SAP Central Services tier will be configured with the specified IPs as secondary IPs

Parameters.Name: scs_server_no_avset
Parameters.Description: If true, the SAP Central Services tier will not use an availability set

Parameters.Name: scs_server_no_ppg
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Central Services will not be placed in a proximity placement group

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Provides the SKU to use for the webdispatcher servers

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the network interface cars connected to the webdispatcher subnet

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the network interface cars connected to the admin subnet

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the load balancer for the network interface cars connected to the application subnet

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the webdispatcher servers

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Web Dispatchers will be configured with the specified IPs as secondary IPs

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_no_avset
Parameters.Description: If true, the Web Dispatcher tier will not use an availability set

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_no_ppg
Parameters.Description: If provided, the web dispatchers will not be placed in a proximity placement group

Parameters.Name: azure_files_sapmnt_id
Parameters.Description: Azure File Share ID for SAPMNT

Parameters.Name: sapmnt_private_endpoint_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for an private endpoint connection

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_for_HANA_data
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create ANF volumes for HANA data

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the size of the HANA data volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_data_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing data volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_data_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Data volume name

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the data volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_for_HANA_log
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create ANF volumes for HANA log

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the size of the HANA log volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_log_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing log volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_log_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Log volume name

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the log volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_for_HANA_shared
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create ANF volumes for HANA shared

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the size of the HANA shared volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_shared_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing shared volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_name
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the name of the HANA shared volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the /shared volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_for_usr_sap
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create ANF volumes for /usr/sap

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the size of the  /usr/sap volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_usr_sap_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing  /usr/sap volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_usr_sap_volume_name
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the name of the /usr/sap volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_usr_sap_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the /usr/sap volume

Parameters.Name: use_private_endpoint
Parameters.Description: Use private endpoint for the deployment

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_sapmnt_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing sapmnt volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt_volume_name
Parameters.Description: sapmnt volume name

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_sapmnt_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the size of the sapmnt volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_sapmnt_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the sapmnt volume

Parameters.Name: deploy_anchor_vm
Parameters.Description: Controls if an anchor VM should be deployed

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_sku
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine SKU

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_authentication_username
Parameters.Description: Value of the username for the Anchor VM

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the default authentication model for the Anchor VM

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_accelerated_networking
Parameters.Description: Defines if the anchor VM should use accelerated networking

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_image
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provide the IP addresses for the the Anchor VMs

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Controlls if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used

Parameters.Name: automation_password
Parameters.Description: Provides a password for the automation user. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_public_key
Parameters.Description: Provides a path to an existing ssh public key file. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_private_key
Parameters.Description: Provides a path to an existing ssh private key file. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: resource_offset
Parameters.Description: Provides an offset for resource naming

Parameters.Name: vm_disk_encryption_set_id
Parameters.Description: Defines the custom encryption key

Parameters.Name: nsg_asg_with_vnet
Parameters.Description: Controls where the Application Security Groups are created

Parameters.Name: proximityplacementgroup_names
Parameters.Description: A list of proximity placement groups to create

Parameters.Name: proximityplacementgroup_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: A list of Azure resource identifiers specifying existing proximity placement groups

Parameters.Name: deploy_application_security_groups
Parameters.Description: Defines if application security groups will be created

Parameters.Name: user_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Azure resource identifier of the credentials keyvault

Parameters.Name: spn_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Azure resource identifier of the deployment credential keyvault

Parameters.Name: enable_purge_control_for_keyvaults
Parameters.Description: Disables the purge protection for Azure keyvaults. USE THIS ONLY FOR TEST ENVIRONMENTS

Parameters.Name: deployer_tfstate_key
Parameters.Description: The state file name for the deployer

Parameters.Name: tfstate_resource_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for the Storage account in the SAP Library that will contain the Terraform state files

Parameters.Name: landscape_tfstate_key
Parameters.Description: The state file name for the workload deployment
